tool.name: CpptrajMask
tool.description: : Wrapper of the Ambertools Cpptraj module for extracting a selection of atoms from a given cpptraj compatible trajectory.

param.name: input_top_path
param.label: input TOP,PDB,PRMTOP,PARMTOP,ZIP file
param.help: Path to the input structure or topology file. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: input_traj_path
param.label: input MDCRD,CRD,CDF,NETCDF,RESTART,NCRESTART,RESTARTNC,DCD,CHARMM,COR,PDB,MOL2,TRR,GRO,BINPOS,XTC,CIF,ARC,SQM,SDF,CONFLIB file
param.help: Path to the input trajectory to be processed. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: outname_output_cpptraj_path
param.label: output MDCRD,CRD,NETCDF,RST7,NCRST,DCD,PDB,MOL2,BINPOS,TRR,XTC,SQM name
param.help: Path to the output processed trajectory Format: [output].[format]

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: mask
param.label: mask
param.option: c-alpha - All c-alpha atoms; protein only
heavy-atoms - System heavy atoms; not hydrogen
solute - All system atoms except solvent atoms

param.name: format
param.label: format
param.option: cdf - Format used by netCDF software library for writing and reading chromatography-MS data files
netcdf - Format used by netCDF software library for writing and reading chromatography-MS data files
restart - AMBER coordinate/restart file with 6 coordinates per line
ncrestart - AMBER coordinate/restart file with 6 coordinates per line
restartnc - AMBER coordinate/restart file with 6 coordinates per line
charmm - Format of CHARMM Residue Topology Files (RTF)
mol2 - Complete and portable representation of a SYBYL molecule
trr - Trajectory of a simulation experiment used by GROMACS
binpos - Translation of the ASCII atom coordinate format to binary code
xtc - Portable binary format for trajectories produced by GROMACS package
cif - Entry format of PDB database in mmCIF format
sdf - One of a family of chemical-data file formats developed by MDL Information Systems

param.name: cpptraj_path
param.label: cpptraj_path
param.help: Path to the cpptraj executable binary.
